entities.description: Use of any specific prescription drugs, such as pain relievers, tranquilizers, stimulants, and sedatives, in any defined period.
Use of any specific prescription drugs in the past 12 months.
Use of any specific prescription drugs at any point in the respondent's life.
Use of any specific prescription drugs in the past 30 days.
Use of prescription drugs in a manner not intended by the prescribing doctor.
An indefinite period of when the most recent misuse of prescription drugs occurred.

relationships.description: Indicates whether the respondent used specific prescription drugs in the past year.
Indicates whether the respondent used specific prescription drugs at any point in their lifetime.
Indicates whether the respondent used specific prescription drugs in the past 30 days.
Indicates whether the respondent used prescription drugs in a manner not intended by the prescribing doctor.
Indicates whether the respondent has an indefinite period of misuse for prescription drugs.
Classifies misuse as a category of prescription drug use.
